messages.title: Dear Miss
messages.content: I recently attended the protest in Rhyl about the downgrading of maternity services and was pleased to speak clearly in support of the 2000 campaigners who assembled.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Concerned about the Assembly Government's running of the health service in Wales, particularly issues like waiting times, lack of a Cancer Drugs Fund, or the closure of services. Opposes the closure of doctor-led maternity services at Glan Clwyd Hospital.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It is noted that the election outcome in Vale of Clwyd will be critical for the next generation, suggesting the importance of strategic voting.

issues.health: Issues with the Assembly Government's running of the health service in Wales, concerns about the downgrading of maternity services, the neglect of a Cancer Drugs Fund, and closure of services.

contactInformation.address: North Wales Conservatives, 3 Llewelyn Road, Colwyn Bay LL29 7AP

images.caption: Dr James Davies with constituents and in dialogue with another individual.
